Test cpp11 integration.

```{asciicastcpp11, echo = TRUE}
double mean_cpp(doubles x) {
  int n = x.size();
  double total = 0;
  for (double value : x) {
     total += value;
  }
  return total / n;
}
```

```{asciicast 1-cpp11-mean}
mean_cpp(1:10000*1.0)
```
